participant_1.name: Megan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and thoughtful, I enjoy exploring new places and meeting new people. I have a strong desire to improve myself both physically and mentally.
participant_1.background: I love to challenge myself physically and mentally, and I find that yoga provides the perfect opportunity for both. I'm not as active as I should be, and I need to lose weight. I enjoyed playing games with my friends and going on adventures together. I'd rather talk about my favorite places to drive. I do not like the song Sweet Home Alabama.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Caring and dedicated, my family is my top priority. I have a practical approach to life, balancing work with my responsibilities as a parent.
participant_2.background: I have two kids who are my everything. I have a bad back from years of standing on my feet all day. I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears. I love watching anime. I work long shifts and miss my son.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I am doing okay, I am just a little tired.
I am sorry to hear that, are you working long hours?
Yes, I work long shifts and I miss my son.
I can imagine that is hard, how old is your son?
He is 3 years old and he is the light of my life.
I am sure he is, what is his name?
His name is Ryan and he is the sweetest little boy.
I can imagine, I love kids.
No, but I do have a dog named Bailey.
I love dogs, they are so cute.
They are, she is the best dog I have ever had.
I am sure she is, I love dogs.
